reviewText: A great BBC series about the First World War. Very well done considering the budget!

I absolutely love this series, I saw it on Netflix when it first came out, so I decided to purchase the DVD.... however, much to my dismay, I discovered that my DVD player would not play this DVD due to it being a British DVD, and not an American DVD. I am a bit disappointed, however have nothing but amazing things to say about this miniseries. Just make sure you are well aware if you are ordering this in the United States, it MIGHT not work.
wow this is good. hands down the best WW1 depiction i have ever seen.  spellbinding.
With characteristic attention to detail, the BBC has produced an excellent depiction of several different aspects of World War I tactical action.  Well worth watching.
